methods.Synopsis: Authenticates a person. This is used for consumer access to stores, administration of stores and management of assets

parameters.Name: auth_user
parameters.Description: The person's login (the email address used with the account)

parameters.Name: auth_password
parameters.Description: The password for the account

parameters.Name: auth_store
parameters.Description: The store one wishes to access. For management and administration purposes, use the store "null"

methods.Synopsis: Creates a new account

parameters.Name: email
parameters.Description: The email to use for this account. Must be unique, as only one account per email is permitted

parameters.Name: password
parameters.Description: The password to be used with this account

parameters.Name: firstname
parameters.Description: The person's first name

parameters.Name: middlenames
parameters.Description: The person's middle names

parameters.Name: lastname
parameters.Description: The person's last name

methods.Synopsis: Confirms a new (or reactivated) account

parameters.Name: code
parameters.Description: The code received in the confirmation email

parameters.Name: id
parameters.Description: Numeric ID of the account to activate

parameters.Name: email
parameters.Description: The email associated with the account

methods.Synopsis: Retrieves all public information related to an asset including the name, description, license, version, partner (owner/publisher), tags and related images and whether or not the currentl authenticated account can download it

parameters.Name: assetId
parameters.Description: The id of the asset, which must exist in the store you are authenticated against

methods.Synopsis: Attempts to download an asset; if the asset is not available or not yet purchased an error with that informaton is returned. It is up to the client to decide how to install or otherwise put to use the downloaded asset

parameters.Name: assetId
parameters.Description: The id of the asset to download, which must exist in the store you are authenticated against

methods.Synopsis: Attempts to purchase an asset; if the asset is not available in the store currently authenticated against or the account does not have enough ponts, an error with that informaton is returned

parameters.Name: assetId
parameters.Description: The id of the asset to download, which must exist in the store you are authenticated against

methods.Synopsis: Creates a new asset owned by you. A file named "info" must be uploaded that contains all the metadata for the asset, a file named "asset" which is the actual asset,
Deletes an asset

parameters.Name: assetId
parameters.Description: Updates a new asset owned by you. A file named "info" must be uploaded that contains all the metadata for the asset, a file named "asset" which is the actual asset,

methods.Synopsis: Updates an asset

parameters.Name: assetId
parameters.Description: The id of the asset to delete. Must be owned by a partner you are affiliated with

methods.Synopsis: Lists the assets that belong to you

parameters.Name: type
parameters.Description: Which kind of listing to use

methods.Synopsis: Lists all top level categories in the store currently authenticated against
Lists all sub-categories and assets in a given category

parameters.Name: channelId
parameters.Description: The numeric id of category to list

parameters.Name: pageSize
parameters.Description: The number of results to return at a time

parameters.Name: offset
parameters.Description: The search result offset to start listing from

methods.Synopsis: Searches through all assets in a given category, matching in names, metadata and relevant tags and returning paged results

parameters.Name: channelId
parameters.Description: The numeric id of category to search in; will also search all sub-categories

parameters.Name: query
parameters.Description: The text to search for

parameters.Name: pageSize
parameters.Description: The number of results to return at a time

parameters.Name: offset
parameters.Description: The search result offset to start listing from

methods.Synopsis: Lists all collections for the authenticated account
Lists the assets in a collection

parameters.Name: collectionId
parameters.Description: The id of the collection

methods.Synopsis: Creates a new collection and returns the details of the new collection

parameters.Name: name
parameters.Description: The name of the new collection

parameters.Name: public
parameters.Description: Whether or not this collection should be viewable by others

parameters.Name: wishlist
parameters.Description: Whether or not this collection is a wishlist

methods.Synopsis: Deletes a collection

parameters.Name: collectionId
parameters.Description: The id of the collection

methods.Synopsis: Add an asset to a collection

parameters.Name: collectionId
parameters.Description: The id of the collection

parameters.Name: assetId
parameters.Description: The id of the asset to add

methods.Synopsis: Removes an asset from a collection

parameters.Name: collectionId
parameters.Description: The id of the collection

parameters.Name: assetId
parameters.Description: The id of the asset to add

methods.Synopsis: Purchases a given number of points using a registered payment method.

parameters.Name: points
parameters.Description: The number of points to purchase

methods.Synopsis: Fetches the amount a given number of points costs

parameters.Name: amount
parameters.Description: The number of points to purchase. Minimum 100, will be rounded upward to the nearest 100

methods.Synopsis: Redeems a code for the number of points it is worth, which then gets added to the currently authenticated account. These codes are created and stored in the database and redeemable only once

parameters.Name: code
parameters.Description: The alphanumeric code
